apis.name: Projects API
apis.description: Interact with projects using the REST API.

apis.name: Project visibility level
apis.description: For more, read Project visibility.

apis.name: Project merge method
apis.description: There are three options for merge_method to choose from:

apis.name: List all projects
apis.description: You can filter by custom attributes with:

attributes.name: archived
attributes.description: Limit by archived status.

attributes.name: id_after
attributes.description: Limit results to projects with IDs greater than the specified ID.

attributes.name: id_before
attributes.description: Limit results to projects with IDs less than the specified ID.

attributes.name: imported
attributes.description: Limit results to projects which were imported from external systems by current user.

attributes.name: last_activity_after
attributes.description: Limit results to projects with last_activity after specified time. Format: ISO 8601 (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ)

attributes.name: last_activity_before
attributes.description: Limit results to projects with last_activity before specified time. Format: ISO 8601 (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ)

attributes.name: membership
attributes.description: Limit by projects that the current user is a member of.

attributes.name: min_access_level
attributes.description: Limit by current user minimal access level.

attributes.name: order_by
attributes.description: Return projects ordered by id, name, path, created_at, updated_at, last_activity_at, or similarity fields. repository_size, storage_size, packages_size or wiki_size fields are only allowed for administrators. similarity (introduced in GitLab 14.1) is only available when searching and is limited to projects that the current user is a member of. Default is created_at.

attributes.name: owned
attributes.description: Limit by projects explicitly owned by the current user.

attributes.name: repository_checksum_failed
attributes.description: Limit projects where the repository checksum calculation has failed.

attributes.name: repository_storage
attributes.description: Limit results to projects stored on repository_storage. (administrators only)

attributes.name: search_namespaces
attributes.description: Include ancestor namespaces when matching search criteria. Default is false.

attributes.name: search
attributes.description: Return list of projects matching the search criteria.

attributes.name: simple
attributes.description: Return only limited fields for each project. This is a no-op without authentication as then only simple fields are returned.

attributes.name: sort
attributes.description: Return projects sorted in asc or desc order. Default is desc.

attributes.name: starred
attributes.description: Limit by projects starred by the current user.

attributes.name: statistics
attributes.description: Include project statistics. Only available to Reporter or higher level role members.

attributes.name: topic
attributes.description: Comma-separated topic names. Limit results to projects that match all of given topics. See topics attribute.

attributes.name: visibility
attributes.description: Limit by visibility public, internal, or private.

attributes.name: wiki_checksum_failed
attributes.description: Limit projects where the wiki checksum calculation has failed.

attributes.name: with_custom_attributes
attributes.description: Include custom attributes in response. (administrator only)

attributes.name: with_issues_enabled
attributes.description: Limit by enabled issues feature.

attributes.name: with_merge_requests_enabled
attributes.description: Limit by enabled merge requests feature.

attributes.name: with_programming_language
attributes.description: Limit by projects which use the given programming language.

apis.name: Pagination limits
apis.description: Keyset pagination supports only order_by=id. Other sorting options aren’t available.

apis.name: List user projects
apis.description: This endpoint supports keyset pagination for selected order_by options.

apis.name: Get single project
apis.description: If the project is a fork, the forked_from_project field appears in the response. For this field, if the upstream project is private, a valid token for authentication must be provided. The field mr_default_target_self appears as well. If this value is false, then all merge requests will target the upstream project by default.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project.

attributes.name: license
attributes.description: Include project license data.

attributes.name: statistics
attributes.description: Include project statistics. Only available to Reporter or higher level role members.

attributes.name: with_custom_attributes
attributes.description: Include custom attributes in response. (administrators only)

apis.name: Templates for issues and merge requests
apis.description: Users of GitLab Premium or higher can also see the issues_template and merge_requests_template parameters for managing issue and merge request description templates.

apis.name: Get project users
apis.description: Get the users list of a project.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project.

attributes.name: search
attributes.description: Search for specific users.

attributes.name: skip_users
attributes.description: Filter out users with the specified IDs.

apis.name: List a project’s groups
apis.description: Get a list of ancestor groups for this project.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project.

attributes.name: search
attributes.description: Search for specific groups.

attributes.name: shared_min_access_level
attributes.description: Limit to shared groups with at least this access level.

attributes.name: shared_visible_only
attributes.description: Limit to shared groups user has access to.

attributes.name: skip_groups
attributes.description: Skip the group IDs passed.

attributes.name: with_shared
attributes.description: Include projects shared with this group. Default is false.

apis.name: Get project events
apis.description: Refer to the Events API documentation.

apis.name: Create project
apis.description: If your HTTP repository isn’t publicly accessible, add authentication information to the URL https://username:password@gitlab.company.com/group/project.git, where password is a public access key with the api scope enabled.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: The name of the new project. Equals path if not provided.

attributes.name: path
attributes.description: Repository name for new project. Generated based on name if not provided (generated as lowercase with dashes). Starting with GitLab 14.9, path must not start or end with a special character and must not contain consecutive special characters.

attributes.name: allow_merge_on_skipped_pipeline
attributes.description: Set whether or not merge requests can be merged with skipped jobs.

attributes.name: analytics_access_level
attributes.description: One of disabled, private or enabled

attributes.name: approvals_before_merge
attributes.description: How many approvers should approve merge requests by default. To configure approval rules, see Merge request approvals API.

attributes.name: auto_cancel_pending_pipelines
attributes.description: Auto-cancel pending pipelines. This isn’t a boolean, but enabled/disabled.

attributes.name: auto_devops_deploy_strategy
attributes.description: Auto Deploy strategy (continuous, manual or timed_incremental).

attributes.name: auto_devops_enabled

apis.name: Configure pull mirroring for a project
apis.description: Configure pull mirroring while creating a new project or updating an existing project using the API if the remote repository is publicly accessible or via username:token authentication. In case your HTTP repository is not publicly accessible, you can add the authentication information to the URL: https://username:token@gitlab.company.com/group/project.git, where token is a personal access token with the API scope enabled.

attributes.name: import_url
attributes.description: URL of remote repository being mirrored (with user:token if needed).

attributes.name: mirror
attributes.description: Enables pull mirroring on project when set to true.

attributes.name: mirror_trigger_builds
attributes.description: Trigger pipelines for mirror updates when set to true.

attributes.name: only_mirror_protected_branches
attributes.description: Limits mirroring to only protected branches when set to true.
